title: Spring Boot
subTitle: This is a subtitle
overviewContent: I have leveraged Spring Boot to rapidly develop scalable, microservices-based applications. Its streamlined dependency management and embedded server capabilities have allowed me to create and maintain complex systems efficiently. I have worked extensively with RESTful APIs, implemented security features, and handled configuration management, ensuring that solutions are modular, flexible, and high-performing.

relatedProject.projectName: H & H Lawyers Website and Server Migration
